title: What has been changed in Fontographer 4.7.3?
content:
I just noticed that Fontlab has released another [revision of Fontographer](http://web.archive.org/web/20070628214410/http:/www.macupdate.com/info.php/id/20011). This is undoubtedly good news, but can anyone from the company (Adam? Yuri?) list the changes and fixes between version 4.7.2 and 4.7.3? I have been unable to locate any release notes on the Fontlab site or in the user forums.

Inquiring minds want to know.

And while you’re digging around, I’d appreciate knowing what the differences between the version 4.7.1 and 4.7.2 releases are as well.

Thanks.

author: Grant Hutchinson

comments.content:
I have added a list of major changes in 4.7.3 to the announcement:

[http://www.fontlab.com/The-News/Announcements/Fontographer-4.7.3/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070628214410/http:/www.fontlab.com/The-News/Announcements/Fontographer-4.7.3/ "http://www.fontlab.com/The-News/Announcements/Fontographer-4.7.3/")

Unfortunately, we don’t have a list of changes for the earlier minor updates handy. But mostly, these were bugfixes resulting from the porting of Fontographer 4.1 to Mac OS X — no features added or principal functionality changes.

Regards,  
Adam
Wonderful. That’s very helpful Adam. Thank you.
Also unfortunately is that it doesn’t download.
